Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Westbound Reroute near 67th/Hoyne
ShortDescription: Westbound 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 63rd and Western due to street blockage near near 67th/Hoyne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 63rd and Western due to street blockage near near 67th/Hoyne.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
